name: Aspen OG
description: Aspen OG by 303 Seeds is a testament to how rich the Rocky’s cannabis heritage really is. This Sour Cream and SFV OG cross “is sweet like Aspen in the summer and coated white like Aspen in the winter,” topped with glistening trichomes that shimmer like snow. Aspen OG combines physical elements from each parent to easily curb moderate pain and stimulate the appetite. Expect earthy flavors with a sweet berry undertone.
attributes_title: Focused, Happy, Energetic, Relaxed, Talkative, Headaches, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Inflammation
